(Medium)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/schema/transaction_by_hash/mod.rs] [Schema: TransactionByHashSchema] [State checkpoint transaction indexing] Are state checkpoint transactions included in TransactionByHashSchema, or can these special transactions bypass the hash index causing lookup failures? (Low)
